text: "Stay with Me" is a song by English singer Sam Smith. The song was released through his debut studio album In the Lonely Hour (2014). It was released in the United States on 14 April 2014 and in the United Kingdom on 18 May 2014. "Stay with Me" is a gospel-inspired ballad. The song was written by Smith, James Napier, and William Phillips. Tom Petty and Jeff Lynne receiving co- writer credits due to the song's similarity to Petty's single "I Won't Back Down". ==References== Category:2014 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Blue-eyed soul songs Category:Soul ballads Category:Sam Smith songs Category:Mary J. Blige songs Category:The Temptations songs
title: Stay with Me (Sam Smith song)
